restaurant.name: Mexican Restaurant Pilot
restaurant.description: Authentic Mexican cuisine - Pilot restaurant for Fynlo POS

menu_items.name: Nachos
menu_items.description: Homemade corn tortilla chips with black beans, tomato salsa, pico de gallo, feta, guac & coriander

menu_items.name: Quesadillas
menu_items.description: Folded flour tortilla filled with mozzarella, topped with tomato salsa, feta & coriander

menu_items.name: Chorizo Quesadilla
menu_items.description: Folded flour tortilla filled with chorizo & mozzarella. Topped with tomato salsa, feta & coriander

menu_items.name: Chicken Quesadilla
menu_items.description: Folded flour tortilla filled with chicken, peppers, onion & mozzarella. Topped with salsa, feta & coriander

menu_items.name: Tostada
menu_items.description: Crispy tortillas with black beans filled with chicken or any topping, served with salsa, lettuce and feta

menu_items.name: Carnitas
menu_items.description: Slow cooked pork, served with onion, coriander, salsa, guacamole & coriander

menu_items.name: Cochinita
menu_items.description: Marinated pulled pork served with pickle red onion

menu_items.name: Barbacoa de Res
menu_items.description: Juicy pulled beef topped with onion, guacamole & coriander

menu_items.name: Chorizo
menu_items.description: Grilled chorizo with black beans, onions, salsa, coriander & guacamole

menu_items.name: Rellena
menu_items.description: Fried black pudding with beans, onion & chilli. Topped with coriander and pickled red onion

menu_items.name: Chicken Fajita
menu_items.description: Chicken, peppers & onion with black beans. Topped with salsa, guac & coriander

menu_items.name: Haggis
menu_items.description: Haggis with beans, onion & chilli. Topped with coriander and pickled red onion

menu_items.name: Pescado
menu_items.description: Battered cod with guacamole & coriander. Topped with red cabbage & mango chilli salsa

menu_items.name: Dorados
menu_items.description: Crispy rolled tortillas filled with chicken, topped with salsa, lettuce and feta

menu_items.name: Dorados Papa
menu_items.description: Crispy rolled tortillas filled with potato, topped with salsa, lettuce and feta

menu_items.name: Nopal
menu_items.description: Cactus, black beans & onion, topped with tomato salsa and crumbled feta

menu_items.name: Frijol
menu_items.description: Black beans with fried plantain served with tomato salsa, feta & coriander

menu_items.name: Verde
menu_items.description: Courgette & sweetcorn fried with garlic, served with tomato salsa and crumbled feta

menu_items.name: Fajita
menu_items.description: Mushrooms, peppers & onion with black beans. Topped with salsa, feta & coriander

menu_items.name: Carne Asada
menu_items.description: Diced rump steak with peppers and red onion. Served on black beans, topped with chimichurri sauce & coriander

menu_items.name: Camaron
menu_items.description: Prawns with chorizo, peppers and red onion. Served on black beans, topped with tomato salsa, coriander & guacamole

menu_items.name: Pulpos
menu_items.description: Chargrilled octopus, cooked with peppers and red onion. Served on grilled potato with garlic & coriander

menu_items.name: Regular Burrito
menu_items.description: Choose any filling from the taco menu! With black beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, & guacamole. Topped with salsa, feta and coriander.

menu_items.name: Special Burrito
menu_items.description: Choose any filling from the special tacos menu! With black beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, & guacamole. Topped with salsa, feta and coriander.

menu_items.name: Add Mozzarella
menu_items.description: Add extra cheese to any burrito

menu_items.name: Skinny Fries
menu_items.description: Thin cut fries

menu_items.name: Pico de Gallo
menu_items.description: Diced tomato, onion and chilli - FREE!

menu_items.name: Green Chili
menu_items.description: Homemade green chili salsa - HOT! - FREE!

menu_items.name: Pineapple Habanero
menu_items.description: Pineapple sauce with habanero chili - HOT! - FREE!

menu_items.name: Scotch Bonnet
menu_items.description: Homemade spicy salsa made with scotch bonnet chilies - VERY HOT! - FREE!

menu_items.name: Pink Paloma
menu_items.description: An alcohol-free version of our refreshing cocktail. Tangy lime juice and grapefruit soda, with a splash of grenadine

menu_items.name: Coco-Nought
menu_items.description: Coconut, pineapple juice and milk, blended into a creamy, sweet, alcohol-free treat!

menu_items.description: Rich, full-flavoured Pilsner style Lager. Crisp and refreshing. 355ml
